modName: Flawless from Flawed Gem Conversion - 1 from 3
summary: This small mod adds the ability to convert any of the 6 vanilla gems to one of their flawless counterparts at the regular forge at a ratio of 1 flawless from 3 flawed.
descriptionHtml:
This small mod adds the ability to convert any of the 6 vanilla gems to one of their flawless counterparts at the regular forge at a ratio of 1 flawless from 3 flawed.

Cheerybelle's Micromods Nexus: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/8170278/?tb=mods][u]https://www.nexusmods.com/users/8170278?tab=user+files&BH=1[/u][/url]
Cheerybelle's Micromods Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=242267049

Ported to Special Edition as an all-in-one single-ESP compilation: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/10445/?
author: Cheerybelle
